#include <iostream>
#include <map>
#include <vector>
#include <algorithm>

using namespace std;

int main()
{
	string str;
	while(getline(cin,str))
	{
		string tmp = "";
		int cctr = 0;
		for(unsigned int i = 0; i < str.length(); i++)
		{
			if(isalnum(str[i]) == false)
			{
				for(int rev = i-1; rev >= cctr; rev--)
					cout << str[rev];
				cout << str[i];
				cctr = 1+i;
			}
			
		}//end for

		cout << endl;
	}//end while
	
}//end main
